actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide Federal reimbursement to State and local governments for a limited sales, use, and retailers' occupation tax holiday.

summary.text: Sales Tax Holiday Act of 2008 - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to reimburse each state that elects to partipicapte in a sales tax holiday period (beginning after April 3, 2008, and ending before April 14, 2008) for 60% of the amount of state and local sales tax payable and not collected during such period.

titles.title: A bill to provide Federal reimbursement to State and local governments for a limited sales, use, and retailers' occupation tax holiday.
